name: Italian Stallion
overview: Alright ladies and gents, this is the main event; you're fighting for the championship of the World MSX Boxing Association, the coveted WMBA title belt. Nervous?. You have to win five matches to win the tournament. Every fight will be more difficult but nothing enough for a real champion. Italian Stallion is a boxing arcade game, conversion of Super Punch Out, presented at the MSXdev 2007 contest.
